moms_short: Are you someone passionate about cooking and interested in making some money
kids_short: Are you someone passionate about eating food and in need of some great quality food
moms_long: Well let me guess you are a homemaker and you want to contribute to your home's money pool but you are not able to find a start so here we are providing you with an opportunity to get a start.
kids_long: Well let me guess you are a student, or anyone else and you are away from your home and is in search of a way to get quality food for yourself, well we'll help you.
